network.title: Network Error
network.message: Please try again when you have a better internet connection.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.message: An error occurred. Please contact support or try again later.

404.title: Not Found
404.message: The requested resource could not be found.

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You do not have permission to access this resource.

400.title: Bad Request
400.message: The request was invalid. Please try again with valid input.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: You are not authorized to access this resource.

default.title: Error
default.message: An error occurred. Please contact support or try again later.
